about_the_game:
Transport yourself to the fantastical lands of Gatherac with the Baladins original soundtrack, featuring 16 tracks from composer Jose Pavli guaranteed to turn any quest into the adventure of a lifetime. 🐲

(Disclaimer: We cannot be held responsible if an enormous time-eating dragon shows up within your home to assess your taste in music.)

Transport yourself to the fantastical lands of Gatherac with the Baladins original soundtrack, featuring 16 tracks from composer Jose Pavli guaranteed to turn any quest into the adventure of a lifetime. 🐲

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 300 MB available space
